subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN1735 is on the way
description_text:
Hello, I received this order, but I did not see any of the springs or
elastomers in the package. There were the hydraulic rods and the bears and
spacers only. Did I order a version without the springs? I thought that I
got the set that included the extra springs.

Thank you for the assistance.

Joey Garcia

conversations.body_text: Hi Joey Garcia,  We'll check your order once we're back at work today. Please also send us photos of all the parts you've received so we can verify if anything is missing and arrange a reshipment if needed.

Here are pictures of the hydraulic rods and washers / spacers that I got.
They were all in the one bag pictured together. I already put one hydraulic
rod on my brake pedal so I included a picture of it as well.

At first I thought maybe the springs were shipping separately.

Thanks again for the help :-)

Joey
On Fri, Jun 27, 2025 at 5:07 PM service@simsonn.com

Hi Joey Garcia,     After we confirmed with our colleagues in the warehouse, they said it was impossible to miss the elastomer. Please confirm, did you not receive all three sets of elastomers, red, yellow and blue? Please ask if the two hydraulic rods you received are one-way or two-way , and we will send the missing parts for you. We apologize for the inconvenience.

Interesting, I did not see any elastomers at all. Maybe the elastomers were
in the packaging and I did not notice them somehow, but I did not see them.
I really was only interested in getting the extra springs for the clutch
and gas pedal anyway, and I definitely did not see those extra springs in
the package.

I checked and  I have 3 hydraulic rods, two 2 way rods, and one 1 way rod.

here are two pictures of the hydraulic rods that I received showing which
directions they are.

Thanks again for the help.

Joey :-)

[image: IMG_1782.jpeg][image: IMG_1781.jpeg]



On Tue, Jul 1, 2025 at 2:07 AM service@simsonn.com
Hi Joey Garcia,  Sorry, we'll send you a replacement for the two clutch springs and one throttle spring, and 3 sets of elastomers. Thank you for your confirmation.
